text: Titot or Francesc Ribera i Toneu (born June 26, 1967) is a musician and Catalan politician. == Life == Titot was born in Berga, Berguedà, in central Catalonia, Spain. He started the musical group Brams in 1990. In 2000, he started the group Mesclat. In 2006, he started the group Aramateix. In 2011, Titot was elected councilor in the Berga municipal election on the list of the CUP (Candidatura d'Unitat Popular) party. == Books == *Ribera, Francesc. Entestat en la independència. Ara Llibres, 2008. ISBN 9788492406234. *Ribera, Francesc; Creus, Jordi. Història de Catalunya al revés. La Magrana, 2012. ISBN 9788482643946. *Ribera, Francesc. L'assassinat de Guillem de Berguedà. Ara Llibres, 2015. ISBN 9788415645634. == References == Category:Living people Category:1967 births Category:Spanish musicians Category:Politicians from Catalonia
title: Titot
